messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Ka- Boom
messages.msgSnippet: I laughed at my DH when he bought some. We have a well which is very new and alot of silt comes through the filters. Anything that s white turns brown after
messages.messageBody:
I laughed at my DH when he bought some. We have a well which is very new and
alot of silt comes through the filters. Anything that's white turns brown
after repeated water contact. Our white bathtub was brown after about a week and
any kind of spray stuff only got the discolor off after intense scrubbing and
the rough traction area on the bottom never got clean. So, Joe sprayed the tub
while I was "relaxing" on the throne and when I got up and walked by the tub
there where bright white streaks wherever the Ka-Boom touched. I finished
spraying the areas and called joey up. Look!! I didn't even wipe it!!
Absolutely amazing.


Elissa
Mystik Hill Farm
Kearneysville, WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
